sentences.en: And strange to relate I met him thrice yesterday.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是,昨天我遇见过他三次.

sentences.en: He was thrice as strong as an ordinary man.
He was thrice mayor of New York.
He was thrice mayor of our city.
sentences.cn: 他三度担任我们的市长.

sentences.en: His room is thrice the size of mine.
sentences.cn: 他的房间是我的房间三倍大.

sentences.en: If you can read this site, that means you are thrice - blessed.
sentences.cn: 如果你正在阅读这个网页, 表示你得到了三重的幸福.

sentences.en: The metal had been valued at twice or thrice its current price.
sentences.cn: 这种金属以前的估价是目前价格的两到三倍。

sentences.en: There are thrice as many students in our institute now as there was in 1966.
sentences.cn: 我们研究所现在的学生比1966年时多二倍.

sentences.en: They should think not twice, but thrice, before ignoring such advice.
sentences.cn: 对于这样的建议，他们应该反复考虑再决定是否拒绝。

sentences.en: This room is thrice the size of that one.
sentences.cn: 这个房间是那间的三倍大.

sentences.en: Thrice happy is the nation that has a glorious history.
sentences.cn: 具有光荣历史的民族是十分幸运的.

sentences.en: Voters have thrice said no to this mess of pottage.
sentences.cn: 这已经是第三次选民们对这样的条约说不了.

sentences.en: You will fatigue your servant by sending notes to her twice or thrice in a day.
sentences.cn: 你还会支使你的仆人,一天两三次地送信给她.

trans.tran_cn: 三次， 三倍，非常，十分
